MainPackage

Class SimulationParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • MainPackage.SimulationParameters

  • public class SimulationParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with all parameters needed for the simulation referent to the races, horses, spectators, shared regions and log file.
